reg_pit.title: Tofino Mudflats Wildlife Management Area Regulation

change.changenote: Regulation BEFORE repealed by BC Reg 12/2015, effective January 21, 2015.

reg:regulation.reg:title: Tofino Mudflats Wildlife Management Area Regulation

bcl:section.bcl:text: The lands under the administration of the Minister of Environment, as outlined in heavy black on the attached map, are designated the Tofino Mudflats Wildlife Management Area, the whole containing 1 645 hectares, more or less.

reg:content.reg:regnote: Note: The map attached is exempt from publication under section 6 of the Regulations Act. It may be inspected at the offices of the Wildlife Branch, Ministry of Environment.
reg:content.reg:provisionsnote: [Provisions of the Wildlife Act, R.S.B.C. 1996, c. 488, relevant to the enactment of this regulation: section 4]
